welcome_message_body: Welcome to Calumpit, Philippines! Known for its beautiful river and historic landmarks, we invite you to explore the charm of our city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: McDonald’s
restaurants.description: McDonald’s is a fast food restaurant located in Calumpit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baler Airport serves domestic flights to and from various destinations in the Philippines.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Baler Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages to and from the region.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.
